dic module¶

class dic.DIC_NR(debug=False)¶

Bases: object

calculate_from_image(ref_img: str, def_img: str, subset_size: int = 11, ini_guess: list = [0, 0])¶

Calculates deformation from image

Parameters:
  • ref_img (string) – Name of the reference image
  • def_img (string) – Name of the deformation image
  • subset_size (int) – Size of the subset
  • ini_guess (list) – Initial guess of deformation
Returns:

Deformations in x and y for each pixel
Return type:

3D array
calculate_from_video(ref_img: str, def_video: str, subset_size: int = 11, ini_guess: list = [0, 0])¶

Calculates deformation from video

Parameters:
  • ref_img (string) – Name of the reference image
  • def_img (string) – Name of the deformation image
  • subset_size (int) – Size of the subset
  • ini_guess (list) – Initial guess of deformation
Returns:

Deformations in x and y for each pixel for each frame
Return type:

list 3D array
